alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 12:54PM AKST until January 15 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow will begin Friday and Friday night into Saturday morning across the northern panhandle and will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend. Snow is expected to start rather dry and fluffy for most areas but may become wetter and heavier along the outer coast as temperatures gradually warm. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Twelve hour snow rates of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 5 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to start out dry and light and may get wetter and heavier by Sunday. Snow rates will show a gradual increase in intensity through the period with highest snow rates expected Sunday and Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
